text: Observant and thoughtful blog post from @holly_cummins on fashion related to women in tech. Perhaps if we all decide to just wear what we want, the judgement will stop. Also ... age helps because I give way less @#$%s than I used to.ü§£ https://t.co/lSKz4ecHhp
